name: PenguiNFT
description:
We made this in like.... an hour

This is a submission for the Only One Asset Allowed game jam.

I don't think I need to say anything else. Literally just stole the idea from Crimson

Ignore this though. This isn't a real project. We made this because I saw a game jam on my twitter feed.

Enjoy! or dont...

I did not test android build, good luck
